title: Machines of Eden
description: PARADISE GONE WRONG. Awakening on the beach of a tropical island, a futuristic combat hacker finds himself at the center of a plot to turn Earth into a new Eden where humanity has no place. Caught between an advanced A.I. and her sadistic physical counterpart, and with the clock ticking toward an apocalypse, only one thing is clear:They picked the wrong man to push around.Machines of Eden is a science fiction novel that combines techno-thriller plot and pacing with futuristic war and environmentalist themes. Fans of Michael Crichton or Lincoln Child will love this gripping adventure that gives a terrifying look at the near future of warfare and global catastrophe.
author: Shad Callister
